link_desc:
Zabbix active agent to report docker statistics written in Nodejs. The following items are supported:

  • Container CONTAINER disk read
  • Container CONTAINER disk write
  • Container CONTAINER is started
  • Container CONTAINER memory limit
  • Container CONTAINER memory percent
  • Container CONTAINER memory usage
  • Container CONTAINER net receive
  • Container CONTAINER net transmit
  • Container CONTAINER pids count

To run as docker container:

docker run \
  --name=docker-stats \
  --privileged \
  -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  -e ZABBIX_SERVER=your.zabbix.server \
  -e ZABBIX_HOST=your.docker.machine.host \
  -d babinvn/docker-stats-zabbix

Home page: https://github.com/babinvn/docker-stats-zabbix
